data: {"concept_id": "role_interactions", "concept_name": "Character Role Interactions", "type": "element", "definition": "How roles collide—conflict, cooperation, challenge, and growth—driving plot, revealing character, and carrying theme.", "scope_notes": "Four facets: Pairs (classic duos), Webs (triangles/teams), Shifts (role changes), Tools (planning & scene craft). Intensity dials low→medium→high.", "axes": "facet|intensity", "axis_values": "pairs|webs|shifts|tools | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "identity|drive|motivation|decision_style|role_dynamics|theme", "conflicts_with": "flat_roles|aimless_scenes|resetting_conflicts|static_boxes", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_role_interactions_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_role_interactions_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_pair_hero_villain", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "pairs", "description": "Hero vs Villain: opposition personal and thematic; villain blocks the hero’s need, not just the task.", "detection_hint": "Look for value clashes and targeted obstacles that force growth.", "false_positive_risks": "Fights with no personal stakes or theme.", "minimal_example": "Harry vs Voldemort; conflict over survival and identity.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_pair_hero_mentor", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "pairs", "description": "Hero & Mentor: guidance plus friction; tough lessons that force responsibility.", "detection_hint": "Mentor challenges; refusal or delay that matures the hero.", "false_positive_risks": "Pure advice-dump with instant compliance.", "minimal_example": "Frodo & Gandalf; help + responsibility.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_pair_hero_sidekick", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "pairs", "description": "Hero & Sidekick: support/contrast; sidekick has their own wants and flaws that complicate scenes.", "detection_hint": "Grounding, emotional counterweights, practical aid with cost.", "false_positive_risks": "Comic relief with no effect.", "minimal_example": "Holmes & Watson; grounding + challenge.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_pair_hero_foil", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "pairs", "description": "Hero & Foil: contrasting strategies/values create dilemmas.", "detection_hint": "Setups where the foil’s choice tempts or challenges the hero.", "false_positive_risks": "Surface-level contrast only.", "minimal_example": "Katniss & Peeta; toughness vs softness.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_pair_villain_minions", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "pairs", "description": "Villain & Minions: loyalty/fear dynamics reveal villain’s nature.", "detection_hint": "Glances, orders, betrayals inside the crew.", "false_positive_risks": "Anonymous henchmen furniture.", "minimal_example": "Joker with his gang; chaos + leadership shows threat.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_web_triangle", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "webs", "description": "Triangles (e.g., love/loyalty/rivalry) force choice and escalate stakes.", "detection_hint": "Competing pulls visible; aftermath changes relationships.", "false_positive_risks": "Melodrama with zero consequence.", "minimal_example": "Hero–love interest–rival triangle that drives a decision.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_web_team", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "webs", "description": "Teams/ensembles: allies clash/align; sub-roles inside group matter to outcomes.", "detection_hint": "Conflict matrix within the team; alliances shift.", "false_positive_risks": "Everyone agrees; no internal friction.", "minimal_example": "Avengers-style clashes shaping plans.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_shift_role_change", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "shifts", "description": "Role shifts (sidekick→hero, mentor fall, villain redemption) are seeded and costly.", "detection_hint": "Pre-signal cracks; hinge event; new role affects plot/theme.", "false_positive_risks": "Whiplash flips for novelty.", "minimal_example": "Walter White’s slide hero→villain.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_tool_map", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "tools", "description": "Relationship map built early to spot gaps/overlaps.", "detection_hint": "Lines of alliance/conflict drawn before drafting.", "false_positive_risks": "Writing blind to role functions.", "minimal_example": "Simple cast graph with arrows for tension/support.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_tool_scene_goal", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "tools", "description": "Scenes chosen/blocked around role collisions that serve a clear goal.", "detection_hint": "Label the pair/web and state the scene’s purpose.", "false_positive_risks": "Banter scenes that change nothing.", "minimal_example": "Mentor–hero disagreement that forces a new plan.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_tool_theme", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "tools", "description": "Role clashes echo theme (e.g., freedom vs control).", "detection_hint": "Identify which interaction embodies the core message.", "false_positive_risks": "Action divorced from theme.", "minimal_example": "Neo vs Smith as theme engine.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_intensity_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Quiet bonds/clashes; interactions color scenes but seldom alter outcomes.", "detection_hint": "Subtle tension, light support; low public stakes.", "false_positive_risks": "Flatness disguised as nuance.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_intensity_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Interactions shape decisions and subplots; visible to others.", "detection_hint": "Choice points influenced by relationships; consequences reversible.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy motion with no effects.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "signal_id": "sig_intensity_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Interactions drive turning points and theme; consequences stick.", "detection_hint": "Public choices, betrayals, alliances; no reset.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle followed by status quo.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "misconception_id": "flat_roles", "description": "Characters act in isolation; roles never collide meaningfully.", "tells": "Wandering scenes with no relational stakes.", "likely_causes": "Focusing on solo tasks.", "corrective_feedback": "Force pair/web collisions that alter choices.", "micro_drill": "Add one conflict/support beat that changes the plan.", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "misconception_id": "aimless_scenes", "description": "Interaction with no goal or change.", "tells": "Banter, vibe-only talk.", "likely_causes": "Confusing chemistry for function.", "corrective_feedback": "State scene purpose tied to roles.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite with a goal + outcome shift.", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "misconception_id": "resetting_conflicts", "description": "Clashes vanish next scene; no carry-through.", "tells": "Instant forgiveness/forgetting.", "likely_causes": "Fear of complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Echo conflict consequences in later scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 2 echoes and show one.", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_interactions", "misconception_id": "static_boxes", "description": "Rigid roles never evolve.", "tells": "Predictable arcs; no surprise.", "likely_causes": "Locking characters to bios.", "corrective_feedback": "Plan a seeded, costly role shift.", "micro_drill": "Draft a hinge moment with fallout.", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_interactions_pair_label", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Given a scene excerpt, label the pair (hero–villain / hero–mentor / hero–foil / hero–sidekick / villain–minions) and mark intensity (low/med/high).", "expected_features": "Pair label matches evidence; intensity justified by consequence/publicness.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate pair + specific evidence + consequence note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Label or evidence off"}, "distractor_strategy": "Banter with no effect as distractor.", "hint_steps": "1) Name the pair 2) Quote the collision 3) Mark what changes", "variation_axes": "pair|intensity", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_interactions_web_map", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "map", "prompt_template": "Draw a mini web (triangle/team) and annotate how each edge raises stakes or offers support.", "expected_features": "Edges have function; stakes evolve across scenes.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Web reads inevitable and useful", "Meets": "Functional with some gaps", "Developing": "Lines with no function"}, "distractor_strategy": "Pretty webs with no causality.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick 3 nodes 2) Write each edge’s function 3) Note a later echo", "variation_axes": "triangle|team", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_interactions_shift_plan", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Plan a role shift with seeds → hinge event → new function; list the costs.", "expected_features": "Seeds visible; hinge credible; costs stick.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Shift lands and drives plot/theme", "Meets": "Shift plausible", "Developing": "Whiplash flip"}, "distractor_strategy": "Twist-for-twist traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Seed crack 2) Force the hinge 3) Close the exit", "variation_axes": "shift|cost", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_interactions_scene_goal", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Take an aimless interaction and rewrite it with a clear role collision and scene goal.", "expected_features": "Goal stated/implicit; outcome changes options.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Goal + change obvious", "Meets": "Some change", "Developing": "Still vibes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Chemistry-without-consequence trap.", "hint_steps": "1) Name goal 2) Create opposition/support 3) Land a consequence", "variation_axes": "goal|consequence", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_1", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "pairs|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Villain corners the hero privately and offers a bargain that stains the hero’s code.", "context_tags": "temptation|theme", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_2", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "pairs|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Mentor withholds help; the refusal forces the hero to improvise.", "context_tags": "tough_love|growth", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_3", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "webs|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Team splits over plan A vs B; the vote costs the leader a friendship.", "context_tags": "ensemble|stakes", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_4", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "shifts|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Sidekick takes the fall and assumes the hero’s job permanently.", "context_tags": "sacrifice|role_shift", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_5", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "tools|low", "label": "strong", "text": "Relationship map shows two missing confrontations; new scenes are added.", "context_tags": "planning|coverage", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_weak_1", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Jokey sidekick banter that never affects outcomes.", "context_tags": "aimless", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_interactions_weak_2", "concept_id": "role_interactions", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Massive clash that resets completely next scene.", "context_tags": "reset", "source_file": "Character Role Interactions.md", "source_md5": "f1a51e5106d3c16bc1d7ddb90d3b4f1d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:45:48.500670Z"}
